title: Hand puppets
creator_credit: Peking Television, Shanghai Animation Film Studio, Yu Cheh-kuang and Chang Chao-chun
brief_description: Costumed hand and glove puppets of Yang Sheng, master puppeteer. Sheng spends long hours of study to create each character and these are brought to life by his superb technique and artistry. Using traditional and legendary Chinese characters and stories, Sheng is training a new generation of young people who demonstrate the production of a traditional play: “A Robe and a Beauty”, performed in full. Suitable for primary and secondary levels.
